MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Benjolin Oscillator
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Complex chaotic oscillator emulating the oscillator and rungler components of a Benjolin

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Bernoulli Switch
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Stochastically route two inputs to two outputs, with built in scaling and offset capabilities

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: HQ - Harmonic Quantizer
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Computes a selected harmonic or subharmonic partial relative to a root V/Oct, or quantizes input V/Oct to the nearest partial relative to the root

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Knob 5
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: 5 configurable constant voltage knobs

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Linear Beats
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Convert multiple trigger/gate channels into a linear drumming pattern

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Logic
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Flexible logic gate processor suitable for both CV and audio applications

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Mix 4
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Compact audio or CV mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Mix 4 Stereo
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Stereo compact audio or CV mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Non-Octave-Repeating Scale Intervallic Quantizer
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Quantizer for any scale defined by up to 13 intervals between notes

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Poly Sample & Hold Analog Shift Register
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Ten channel polyphonic sample and hold combined with a shift register

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Push 5
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: 5 configurable push buttons

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Quad VC Polarizer
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Compact polyphonic bipolar VCA and mixer inspired by Mutable Instruments Blinds

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Reformation
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Transform CV or audio by mapping way point voltages to new values

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Rhythm Explorer
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Stochastic rhythm generator, trigger sequencer and clock divider

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Shaped VCA
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Stereo VCA with a variable response curve, hard/soft clipping, ring modulation, and oversampling

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: VCA Mix 4
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Compact audio or CV VCA, mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: VCA Mix 4 Stereo
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Stereo compact audio or CV VCA, mixer, attenuator, inverter, amplifier, and/or offset

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: VCO Lab
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Audio or low frequency oscillator with 4 simultaneous waveforms, mixing, linear/exponential FM, phase modulation, hard/soft sync, PWM, and more

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: VCO Unit
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: A smaller version of VCO Lab with only one selectable waveform at a time, and no mixing capabilities

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: Wave Folder
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: A polyphonic configurable wave folder

MetaModuleIncludedModules.name: WinComp
MetaModuleIncludedModules.description: Windowed comparator and rectifier
